abstract: Research in Motion delays release of improved operating system for its Blackberry Playbook tablet, sinking chances of higher holiday sales for product.
snippet: Research in Motion said the new operating system, intended to correct such omissions as the inability to send email without being linked to a phone, won’t be ready until next year.
lead_paragraph: Research in Motion said the new operating system, intended to correct such omissions as the inability to send email without being linked to a phone, won’t be ready until next year.

headline.main: RIM Delays Software Update for Its BlackBerry PlayBook
headline.print_headline: RIM Delays Software Update For Its BlackBerry PlayBook
headline.seo: RIM Delays Software Update for BlackBerry PlayBook
